means: 蠢材，笨学生( dunce的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: The defects of great men are the consolation of dunces.
sentence.Network_cn: 伟人有缺点是愚人的安慰.

sentence.Network_en: Tell these chickenhearted dunces why you alone among them stand on right side of the hall.
sentence.Network_cn: 告诉这些胆小的笨蛋,为什么在他们当中只有你一个人站在大厅的右侧.

sentence.Network_en: Young men think old men are fools, But old men know young men are dunces.
sentence.Network_cn: 青年人以为老年人蠢, 老年人认为年轻人傻.

list.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(D) ... dun 催促 dunce cap 纸帽 dunce 劣学生.
...现了911发生时，小布什在学校里的场景，他戴着傻瓜帽（dunce cap），代表着他表演拙劣，在跳舞前，他做了一个共济会经典手 …

when Park Chung-hee seized power in 1961 , the junta marched many of the racketeers through Seoul wearing dunce caps and placards slogans such as " I am a corrupt swine " .当朴正熙1961年掌权时，该统治集团抓了许多诈骗犯在首尔游街，这些人戴着纸帽子、身上贴着诸如“我是一头腐败的猪”这类的标语。
The wise man knows he knows nothing ; dunce thinks he knows all ., 聪明人知道自己不懂什么 , 蠢人则认为自己什么都懂.
he does not know his letters ,' he said to his cousin .' Could you believe in the existence of such a colossal dunce ?“他不认识字，”他对他的表姐说。“你能相信会有这样的大笨蛋存在吗？”

entry.def: If you say that someone is a dunce, you think they are rather stupid because they find it difficult or impossible to learn what someone is trying to teach them.

example.ex: Michael may have been a dunce at mathematics, but he was gifted at languages.
example.tran: 迈克尔在数学上可能不太灵光，但在语言方面很有天赋。

auth_sentence.content: By the way, I appreciate the way you so patiently help dunces like myself back on to the straight and narrow.
auth_sentence.res_content: By the way, I appreciate the way you so patiently help dunces like myself back on to the straight and narrow.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: By the way, I appreciate the way you so patiently help dunces like myself back on to the straight and narrow.

auth_sentence.content: He said, mockingly, that the government had said that Stewart and Bacanovic belonged to a confederacy of dunces.
auth_sentence.res_content: He said, mockingly, that the government had said that Stewart and Bacanovic belonged to a confederacy of dunces.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He said, mockingly, that the government had said that Stewart and Bacanovic belonged to a confederacy of dunces.
